channel.title: osx on From An Egg
channel.description: Recent content in osx on From An Egg

item.title: Opening changed files in VSCode
item.description: A significant portion of my day to day activities are based around code reviews and helping debug issues with other developers. When doing this I will usually open up all of the files that have changed between the current branch and master so that I can get an understanding of the problem as a whole. After a decade of doing this I finally got sick of doing it manually…There must be a better way!

item.title: How to install Ubuntu on a Mac or Macbook
item.description: The official release date of Ubuntu 14.04 LTS Trusty Tahr is coming up in just over a week from the time of writing. With that, many of you are going to want to install the next version of the best Linux operating system on your computers, and if you want to install on metal along side OSX and have a Apple Mac or Macbook this is the guide for you!
